tool.name: odose
tool.command:
mkdir selected_genomes/ &&
#for $ncbi_genome_selection in $ncbi_genome_selections #if str($ncbi_genome_selection) != "None": mv $ncbi_genome_selection selected_genomes/ && #end if #end for
#for $usergenerated_fasta in $usergenerated_fastas #if str($usergenerated_fasta) != "None": mv $usergenerated_fasta selected_genomes/ && #end if #end for
zip -rj selected_genomes.zip selected_genomes/ &&
mkdir -p poorfasta/ groupstsv/ &&
run_orthomcl selected_genomes.zip poorfasta/ groupstsv/ &&
ls -l selected_genomes/* > '$input_details' &&
## rest of the ODoSE pipeline

param.name: ncbi_genome_selections
param.label: genome dataset
param.help: If your history does not contain the genome files, first run the genome downloader tool

param.name: retainedthreshold
param.label: Minimum % retained after trimmining alignment
param.help: Filter orthologs where less than a given percentage of sequence is retained after trimming alignment

param.name: maxindellength
param.label: Maximum length of insertions and deletions in alignment
param.help: Filter orthologs containing insertions or deletions longer than length (at the nucleic acids level)
